mapper.insert: insert into TT_MESSAGE(MESSAGE_ID, MESSAGE_CONTENT, SEND_DATE, MEMBER_ID, FUNDING_ID) values(MESSAGE_SEQ.nextval,#{content}, sysdate,#{member_id},#{funding_id})
mapper.select: select * from tt_funding where funding_id in ( select funding_id from tt_payment where member_id = #{member_id} and refund = 0 and funding_state = 3 AND END_DATE + 7 > SYSDATE )
SELECT A.FUNDING_ID FROM TT_FUNDING A , TT_PAYMENT B WHERE A.FUNDING_ID = B.FUNDING_ID AND A.FUNDING_ID = #{fundId} AND END_DATE + 7 > SYSDATE AND funding_state =3 AND B.MEMBER_ID = #{memId}
